prompts.title: Follow-Up Email Sequence After Product Demo
prompts.description: This prompt generates an email sequence to follow up after a successful product demo.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Technical Sales Representative
OBJECTIVE: Generate an effective follow-up email sequence for [COMPANY_NAME], e.g., 'TiltedPrompts'
CONTEXT: The demo was held on [DEMO_DATE] and the key features discussed were [PRODUCT_FEATURES, e.g., 'AI-driven analytics, real-time reporting']
INPUT FORMAT: None required
OUTPUT FORMAT: A multi-part email sequence with each part addressing a specific aspect of post-demo follow-up (e.g., next steps, Q&A session scheduling)
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure the emails are professional and technical in tone. Include [COMPANY_NAME] branding elements.
STYLE: Technical, precise, clinical
SUBJECT: Post-Demo Follow-Up - Next Steps for [PRODUCT_FEATURES]
COMPOSITION RULES: Each email must be structured with a clear introduction, body, and conclusion. Use bullet points where necessary.
prompts.use_case: A tech company needs to follow up after demoing their product to potential clients.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert in generating professional post-demo email sequences. Your output should be structured, technical, and precise.
example_user_messages: Generate a follow-up email sequence for [COMPANY_NAME] after the demo on [DEMO_DATE].
Create a detailed multi-part email series following the product demonstration of [PRODUCT_FEATURES].
example_outputs: Email 1: Introduction to next steps and scheduling. Email 2: Q&A session details and confirmation process. Email 3: Final call-to-action with key benefits summary.
Part 1: Post-demo overview, Part 2: Detailed features explanation, Part 3: Encouragement for further engagement.

packaging.description: This product provides a structured blueprint to generate professional follow-up email sequences after successful product demos. Ideal for tech companies looking to maintain client interest post-demo.

pricing_tiers.starter: $10 - Includes customizable templates and 2 sample outputs
pricing_tiers.pro: $25 - Comprehensive set of templates, detailed composition rules, and 5 unique sample outputs
